createJob(string,string,uint256).notice: job creation and increment job count,

depositFunds(uint256).notice: process employer funds deposit for a specific job

hireFreelancer(uint256,address).notice: hiring freelancer and check if freelancer is not already hired for the job

releaseEscrow(uint256,address).notice: release escrow fund after successful completion of the job

withdrawEarnings().notice: process funds withdrawal to the freelancer after successful completion of a job
